captions.text: - I think a condiment's job is to make

everything that you're
eating taste better.
If it doesn't elevate, then why add it?
(suave music)
- Jufran Banana Sauce?
Why is it red?
- That makes no sense.
- Smells like ketchup.
It smells nothing like bananas.
- This label is lying to me.
- Is this sauce that's made from bananas?
Or is it sauce for bananas?
- It says shake well...
- Oh, yeah.
- Wow.
- It's a little bit sweeter than ketchup.
- On the way to barbecue sauce,
but then took a left at banana grove.
- This would be good on chicken fingers.
- I feel like if you were drunk

you wouldn't know that
it wasn't ketchup, maybe.
- What's there to say? It's good!
- Harissa Spread.
Ugh.
Oh.
- What are you?
- Uh oh, it smells like it might be spicy.
- This is really good. It's very tangy.
- This would be really good on pasta.
- Or a ciabatta.
- I hated it at first bite,

and now it's dancing in my
pallet, and all I want is more.

- [Voiceover] Sambal
Terasi Condement Sauce.

- It smells like the spiciest
chili at the chili cook off.
- There's shrimp in here!
- Let's see what this is like.
- Before the spice kicks in,
I just want to say it tastes pretty good.
- I'm pretty impressed with how much
of my mouth it's already affected.
(grunts)
- I think you could put it on rice,
maybe a nice stir fry.
- Whenever heat stuff gets to a certain
heat level it doesn't have flavor anymore.

- There are two ingredients
in salted shrimp:
one is shrimp, the other is salt.
- Look at their little shrimpy eyes.

- Oh god, it smells exactly
like you'd think it'd smell.

- Confirmation that the little
black spots are their eyes.
- I don't want to eat this.
- No.
- Oh my god, there's so much salt on it.

- 40% of your daily sodium
is in here 33 times.

- It would be good on
things that need salt.
- How does this qualify as a condiment?
- So this is Fermented Bean Curd.
Bean curd is great, it's tofu, its soy.
This is disgusting.

- At least this didn't
crawl around at some point.
(yells)
- What the?
(gags)
- Nope.
- Smells very sweet, oh god.
- Look at this thing.
(groans)
(laughs)

- Oh god, that is
literally the worst thing
I've ever tasted in my life.
- Coating my mouth in this salty slime.

- I'm gonna have to date,
get married, have children
and that taste is gonna be in my mouth.
- I might be allergic to that.
- What do you do with this?

- This would go good on
a viking funeral boat
that you put out into the ocean
and then shoot a flaming arrow toward.

- There are probably
people that love this.

- Everybody's got a
different tongue, right?
Cute snack.
(mutters)

I'm just a tiny baby
shrimp, I'm covered in salt,
so if you're hungry, and you're
tired of being well-hydrated, come at me!
It's pretty good, though.

comments.author: Goumadi

comments.text:
theres a lot of fermented bean curds, spicer ones are the best, you DONT 
EAT IT ON A CRACKER ON ONE BITE. I grew  up on that stuff, its best with 
fried dough with soysauce, porridge, and pickles, all Chinese style, I know 
none of that combo seems sense, but if youre ever in china, that stuffs 
good breakfast :)
I think if buzzfeed wants them to try international condiments or anything 
international, eat it like the internationals do, it's like if people in 
china were to try mustard by the spoonful on a cracker, yeah, not very good 
lol﻿

love it.﻿
